files.help:
Set this in your zshrc:

```bash
zstyle ':completion:*' cache-path "$XDG_CACHE_HOME"/zsh/zcompcache
```

Set this in your zshrc:

```bash
compinit -d "$XDG_CACHE_HOME"/zsh/zcompdump-"$ZSH_VERSION"
```

Export the following environment variable:

```bash
export HISTFILE="$XDG_STATE_HOME"/zsh/history
```

Export the following environment variable:

```bash
export HISTFILE="$XDG_STATE_HOME"/zsh/history
```

Export the following environment variable:

```bash
export HISTFILE="$XDG_STATE_HOME"/zsh/history
```

Move file to _"$HOME"/.config/zsh/.zlogin_ and export the following environment variable:

```bash
export ZDOTDIR="$HOME"/.config/zsh
```
You can do this in _/etc/zsh/zshenv_.

Move file to _"$HOME"/.config/zsh/.zshenv_ and export the following environment variable in _/etc/zsh/zshenv_:

```bash
export ZDOTDIR="$HOME"/.config/zsh
```

Move file to _"$HOME"/.config/zsh/.zshrc_ and export the following environment variable:

```bash
export ZDOTDIR="$HOME"/.config/zsh
```
You can do this in _/etc/zsh/zshenv_.
